titleStmt.title: Bibliotheca novissima, or, A Catalogue of books on divers subjects containing, I. Books lately printed in England, II. Books newly reprinted, III. Books now in the press, with a short account of the particular design of several of them : together with a catalogue of books lately printed, now printing and reprinting in France, Germany, Holland, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the booksellers of London and Westminster, and to be sold by Randal Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
